Interface EventInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Appointment, AppointmentView, Availability
public interface EventInterface
EventInterface defines methods for accessing and displaying event details which will be used by the CalendarScreen.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    displayEvent(ConsoleInterface consoleInterface)
    Displays the event details on the specified console.
    LocalDate
    getEventDate()
    Retrieves the date of the event.
    LocalTime
    getEventEndTime()
    Retrieves the end time of the event.
    LocalTime
    getEventStartTime()
    Retrieves the start time of the event.

  • Method Details

    • getEventDate

      LocalDate getEventDate()
      Retrieves the date of the event.
      Returns:
      the LocalDate representing the date of the event.

    • getEventStartTime

      LocalTime getEventStartTime()
      Retrieves the start time of the event.
      Returns:
      the LocalTime representing the start time of the event.

    • getEventEndTime

      LocalTime getEventEndTime()
      Retrieves the end time of the event.
      Returns:
      the LocalTime representing the end time of the event.

    • displayEvent

      void displayEvent(ConsoleInterface consoleInterface)
      Displays the event details on the specified console.
      Parameters:
      consoleInterface - the console interface used to display the event details
